name: The City of Damned Children
summary: Loosely inspired by a cult French film, project lead @Big Ol Billy takes us into a crudely photo-digitized alternate Doom universe, standing on the sturdy shoulders of @Doomkid's "bootleg" Doom64-in-vanilla resources. This Doom 2 limit-removing set features 11 regular maps, plus an additional progression-stopping credit map. You'll also get new monsters, a chance to brush up on your French, and more MIDI accordion than you even knew you were ready for!
